item.title: Part 2/2: How to set up HAProxy infront of active-active replication in postgres
item.description: I hope you gone through Part1 of this series. Perhaps, one thing you might have noticed is that I’ve to connect to the specific master database. In our case, since both the databases are running on docker, only the localhost port is different. (In production environment, most likely you going to run the databases on different host). The main reason for active-active replication is high availability. If one of the node goes down, you still want your application to behave normally.
